string.text:
The AK-101 VGRIP is an assault rifle of the Kalashnikov series. It's marketed at those looking for a weapon that combines the logistical compatibility and familiarity of the 5.56?45mm NATO round with the reliability of a Kalashnikov. The design of this rifle is similar to the AK-74.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] SIGHTS : EOT2, ACOG, LEUPOLD, BRAVO4, HE510, EXPS3, HAMR, RAZORHD
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] SILENCER : NONE
